document_info.title: Pharmahuasca - Pharmaceutical Ayahuasca Guide
document_info.purpose: Guide to pharmaceutical version of ayahuasca using purified substances
document_info.disclaimer: Educational reference only. Documents historical administration research.

definition.description: Pharmaceutical version of the entheogenic brew ayahuasca

traditional_comparison.traditional_ayahuasca: MAOI-containing Banisteriopsis caapi vine brewed with DMT-containing plant (e.g., Psychotria viridis)
traditional_comparison.pharmahuasca: Uses pharmaceutical/purified MAOI instead of plant material

dosage_guidelines.general_rule: NO MORE THAN 1mg DMT per pound of body weight
dosage_guidelines.warning: This is considered a HIGH dose

step_2.action: Take first DMT capsule containing HALF the dose

step_3.action: Take second DMT capsule containing remaining half dose

step_4.action: Experiment to find personal optimal dose

safety_warnings.dose_sensitivity: Small changes in dose weight can have LARGE effects
safety_warnings.machinery: Do NOT attempt to operate machinery during trip
safety_warnings.duration: Expect to be lying down for couple hours
safety_warnings.starting_low: Always start with lower doses and work up
